titles.title: Soldotna Airport Improvement Act of 1993
Soldotna Airport Improvement Act of 1993
A bill to authorize the Secretary of Transportation to release restrictions on the use of certain property conveyed to the city of Soldotna, Alaska, for airport purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S8461)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce.

calendar.text: Committee on Commerce. Ordered to be reported with an amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on Commerce. Reported to Senate by Senator Hollings under the authority of the order of Aug 2, 93 with an amendment. With written report No. 103-131.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 188.

bill.summary: 8/24/1993--Reported to Senate amended. Soldotna Airport Improvement Act of 1993 - Prescribes conditions under which the Secretary of Transportation may grant releases from the terms of a specified deed of conveyance under which the United States conveyed certain property to the city of Soldotna, Alaska, for airport purposes.
